title: BCEWithLogitsLoss TypeError
body_html:
Hi,
When trying to use the new BCEWithLogitsLoss (pytorch version 0.2.0+7be5452), I get the following error:
TypeError: is_same_size received an invalid combination of arguments - got (torch.cuda.FloatTensor), but expected (torch.cuda.LongTensor other)

And indeed, my input of the loss (output of the model forward pass) is a float, and the target is a long (1 or 0), which looks like appropriate types to me so I might have misunderstood something, or the error comes from somewhere else.

I have not used a SoftMax on the output of the last layer so the output of the forward pass is simply the output of my Linear layer.

body:
Hi,
When trying to use the new `BCEWithLogitsLoss` (pytorch version `0.2.0+7be5452`), I get the following error:
```TypeError: is_same_size received an invalid combination of arguments - got (torch.cuda.FloatTensor), but expected (torch.cuda.LongTensor other)```

And indeed, my input of the loss (output of the model forward pass) is a float, and the target is a long (1 or 0), which looks like appropriate types to me so I might have misunderstood something, or the error comes from somewhere else.

I have not used a SoftMax on the output of the last layer so the output of the forward pass is simply the output of my `Linear` layer.
